title: Luke Pollard – 2020 Comments on Fox Hunting
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Luke Pollard, the Labour MP for Plymouth Sutton and Devonport, on 26 December 2020.
content:
Fox hunting should be confined to the history books. So why are Ministers giving hunts an exemption from Coronavirus rules the rest of us have to follow?
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
